channel.title: Carter Wenburg's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Carter Wenburg's Sports Blog

item.title: The Search for College Basketball's Best Home Court Advantage
item.description: What school has the best home court advantage? When you think of the most famous college basketball venues, a few obvious candidates come to mind–Allen Fieldhouse at Kansas, Assembly Hall at Indiana, and even The Pit at New Mexico. Of course, none of these arenas can hold a candle to the most famous arena in college basketball: Cameron Indoor Stadium, home of the Duke Blue Devils. 9,000 Cameron Crazies pack the small arena to the gills for every single game, sending chills up the spines of visiting teams.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my page. I’m Carter Wenburg, a sophomore pre-med student at the University of Nebraska studying the intersection of data analysis and health. I’m especially interested in college basketball.
